consent_noti: We would like to send you push notifications for transaction updates and the latest promotions. Please grant your consent to receive these notifications.
consent_location: When you use our services we may collect location information to provide you with location-based services (such as the location of our service branches, advertisements that are relevant to your geographic location, and conduct analytics to improve the Services). The type of location information we collect depends on your settings in the device you use to access the Services.
consent_camera:
Many of our services require us to collect images and other information from your device's camera and photos. You won't be able to upload your ID photo for registration, take a photo for your profile picture, and scan QR Code to make a payment unless we can access your camera or photos.
We use this information to provide features of Our Service, to improve and customize Our Service. The information may be uploaded to the Company's servers or it may be simply stored on Your device.
You can enable or disable access to this information at any time, through Your Device settings.
consent_contact:
Some of our services require to access your contacts to allow you to make a transaction with your friends who are already in your contact list (such as top-ups, applying internet packages, and transferring money).
We use this information to provide features of our service, to improve and customize our service. We do not store your Contact List information on our server, but we store it on your device to facilitate you in your next transaction.
You can enable or disable access to this information at any time, through your device settings.
consent_start: Welcome to M MoneyX. One app for all Telecom Service,Payment, and more.
